posts.post_title: WTB : T3 Turkey Red Peaches Graham Boston
posts.post_content:
Looking for a presentable ( can be raw) T3 Turkey Red of Peaches Graham.of the Boston Nationals
Want to display it….I do have some T 212’s, T206’s and T207’s to trade 
Anyway…..if you have one at a reasonable price , let me know.
